sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Org
select parent_id, address_name, complete_addr_html,item_id from org_address where parent_id = ? order by address_name

select trans_type, trans_id, caption, detail, to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as trans_begin_stamp, trans_end_stamp, trans_subtype from transaction where ( (trans_owner_type = 1 and trans_owner_id = ?) ) and ( trans_type between 8000 and 8999 ) and ( trans_status = 2 ) order by trans_begin_stamp desc
select * from org_attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = ?
select org_attribute.*, to_char(value_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as value_date from org_attribute where item_id = ?
SELECT item_id FROM Org_Attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 AND value_int = :2 AND item_name = :3
select * from org_attribute where parent_id = ? and item_name = ? and value_type = ?
select * from org_attribute where parent_id = ? and value_type = ?

SELECT item_id,to_char(value_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as value_date,o.org_id FROM org_attribute oa,org o WHERE oa.parent_id = ? and oa.item_name = ? and oa.value_type = ? AND o.org_internal_id = oa.parent_id
select category from org where org_internal_id = ?
SELECT org_id FROM org WHERE owner_org_id = ? AND category IN ('Practice','Clinic','Facility/Site','Diagnostic Service','Department','Hospital','Therapeutical Services')

SELECT o.org_internal_id FROM org o,Org_Category oc WHERE o.owner_org_id = :1 AND ( ( (o.parent_org_id = :2 OR o.owner_org_id = :2) AND :3 = 1) OR o.org_internal_id = :2 ) AND oc.parent_id = o.org_internal_id AND UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(oc.member_name))) IN ('PRACTICE', 'CLINIC','FACILITY/SITE','DIAGNOSTIC SERVICES', 'DEPARTMENT', 'HOSPITAL', 'THERAPEUTIC SERVICES')
select oc.internal_catalog_id, oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description from Offering_Catalog oc where oc.internal_catalog_id = ? and oc.org_internal_id = ? order by internal_catalog_id
select oc.internal_catalog_id, oc.catalog_id, oc.caption, oc.description from Offering_Catalog oc where oc.catalog_type = 4 and oc.org_internal_id = ? order by internal_catalog_id
select * from org_attribute where parent_id = ? and value_type in (10, 15, 20, 40, 50) order by name_sort, item_name
select * from org org, org_category ocat where org.parent_org_id = ? and ocat.member_name = 'Department' and ocat.parent_id = org.org_internal_id
SELECT parent_id FROM org_category WHERE parent_id = :1 AND member_name = :2
select * from hlth_maint_rule where rule_id = ?
select org_id from org where org_internal_id = ?
select member_name from org_category where parent_id = ?
select * from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ?
select * from org_address where parent_id = ? and address_name = ?
select * from org_address where item_id = ?
select member_name from Org_Category where parent_id = ?

select distinct o.*, decode(t.group_name, 'other', 'main', t.group_name) as group_name from org o, org_category cat, org_type t where cat.parent_id = o.org_internal_id and cat.member_name = t.caption and cat.member_name = ( select caption from org_type where id = ( select min(id) from org_type, org_category where parent_id = o.org_internal_id and caption = member_name ) ) and org_internal_id = ?
select * from org_eligibility_input where org_internal_id = ? order by field_order
select distinct o.org_id,o.org_internal_id FROM org o , org_category oc WHERE o.org_internal_id = oc.parent_id AND o.owner_org_id = :1 AND oc.member_name = :2
select org_internal_id from org where owner_org_id = ? AND org_id = ?

SELECT distinct org_internal_id,oa.value_int FROM Org_Category oc, Org o,Org_Attribute oa WHERE o.owner_org_id = :1 AND oc.parent_id = o.org_internal_id AND UPPER(LTRIM(RTRIM(oc.member_name))) IN ('CLINIC','HOSPITAL','FACILITY/SITE','PRACTICE') AND oa.item_name ='Fee Schedules' AND oa.value_type =0 AND oa.parent_id = o.org_internal_id
select name_primary from org where org_internal_id = ?
select * from org where parent_org_id IS NULL AND org_id = ?
select org_internal_id from org where parent_org_id IS NULL AND org_id = ?

select pa.value_type, pa.item_id, pa.value_text, pa.value_textb, pa.value_int, decode(to_char(pa.value_date, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'Mon DD'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'MM/DD/YY')), decode(pa.value_int,0,'Unknown',1,'Per Se',2,'ThinNET','Other'), decode(pa.value_textb,'1','Active','Inactive') from Person_Attribute pa, Org o, Person_Org_Category poc where o.org_id = ? and pa.parent_id = poc.person_id and poc.org_internal_id = o.org_internal_id and pa.value_type = 960 order by pa.value_int

select pa.value_type, pa.item_id, pa.value_text, pa.value_textb, pa.value_int, decode(to_char(pa.value_date, 'YYYY'), to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'Mon DD'), to_char(pa.value_date, 'MM/DD/YY')), decode(pa.value_int,0,'Unknown',1,'Per Se',2,'ThinNET','Other'), decode(pa.value_textb,'1','Active','Inactive') from Person_Attribute pa, Org o, Person_Org_Category poc where o.org_internal_id = ? and pa.parent_id = poc.person_id and poc.org_internal_id = o.org_internal_id and pa.value_type = 960 order by pa.value_int

select org_internal_id from Org where ( owner_org_id in (select org_internal_id from Person_Org_Category where person_id = ?) or parent_org_id in (select org_internal_id from Person_Org_Category where person_id = ?) ) and org_internal_id = ?
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Service_Detail
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Followup_Status
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Payor
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Result
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Service_Type
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Source_Type
SELECT id, caption FROM Referral_Unit_Type
select * from org where org_internal_id = ?
select entry_id, parent_entry_id, entry_type, code, name, cost_type, data_text, data_num, data_date from Offering_Catalog_Entry where catalog_id = ? order by entry_id
select oc.internal_catalog_id from Offering_Catalog oc where oc.catalog_id = ? and oc.org_internal_id = ? order by catalog_id
select * from Offering_Catalog oc where oc.catalog_type = 4 and oc.org_internal_id = ? order by internal_catalog_id
select tax_id from org where org_internal_id = ?
select id, caption from Time_Metric
update org set owner_org_id = ? where org_internal_id = ?
SELECT to_char(value_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') as value_date FROM org_attribute WHERE parent_id = :1 and item_name = :2 and value_type = :3
select * from org_attribute where parent_id = :1 and value_type = 960 and value_intb = 1
select * from person_attribute where parent_id = :1 and value_type = 960 and value_intb = 1
